Posted By: Japicx (3/20/2011 7:29:58 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Accurate flavor text.... yeesh!
  
   
No idea how this pile of drek ended up being printed next to Ishan's Shade. If he cost 6 and had forestwalk all the time for free, he would have at least been of appropriate power for that era. I would have even forgiven a casting cost of 7, which would still have been weak, but black had almost no big creatures back then without drawbacks. But a cost of 7 AND an activation cost that makes it hard for him to be a threat - what were they thinking?!
posts.html:
Accurate flavor text.... yeesh!

No idea how this pile of drek ended up being printed next to Ishan's Shade. If he cost 6 and had forestwalk all the time for free, he would have at least been of appropriate power for that era. I would have even forgiven a casting cost of 7, which would still have been weak, but black had almost no big creatures back then without drawbacks. But a cost of 7 AND an activation cost that makes it hard for him to be a threat - what were they thinking?!
